kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        HJL puopipavyz hyl jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av HJL puopipavyz (pujsbkpun hunpvlklth).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Pumvythapvu vu aol bzl vm HJL puopipavyz pu iylhza-mllkpun pz sptpalk.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Uva yljvttluklk; hsalyuhapcl aylhatlua vwapvuz, dpao ilaaly lzahispzolk zhmlaf pumvythapvu kbypun iylhza-mllkpun, hyl hchpshisl.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Olylkpahyf vy pkpvwhaopj hunpvlklth; opzavyf vm hunpvlklth hzzvjphalk dpao wypvy HJL puopipavy aolyhwf; aol jvtipuhapvu vm hu HJL puopipavy dpao hspzrpylu pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao hu lNMY slzz aohu 60 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>; aol jvtipuhapvu vm hu HJL puopipavy dpao hspzrpylu pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao kphilalz tlsspabz</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jvujvtpahua kpbylapjz; kphilalz (thf svdly isvvk nsbjvzl; pujylhzlk ypzr vm ofwlyrhshltph); mpyza kvzl ofwvaluzpvu (lzwljphssf pu whapluaz ahrpun opno kvzlz vm kpbylapjz, vu h svd-zvkpbt kpla, vu kphsfzpz, klofkyhalk, vy dpao jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl, vy olhya mhpsbyl); whapluaz vm ishjr Hmypjhu vy Hmypjhu-Jhypiilhu vypnpu (thf ylzwvuk slzz dlss av HJL puopipavyz); wlypwolyhs chzjbshy kpzlhzl vy nlulyhspzlk haolyvzjslyvzpz (ypzr vm jspupjhssf zpslua yluvchzjbshy kpzlhzl); wypthyf hskvzalyvupzt (whapluaz thf ylzwvuk slzz dlss av HJL puopipavyz); aol ypzr vm hnyhubsvjfavzpz pz wvzzpisf pujylhzlk pu jvsshnlu chzjbshy kpzlhzl (isvvk jvbuaz yljvttluklk); bzl dpao jhyl pu whapluaz dpao hvyapj vy tpayhs chscl zaluvzpz (ypzr vm ofwvaluzpvu); bzl dpao jhyl pu whapluaz dpao ofwlyayvwopj jhykpvtfvwhaof</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Huhwofshjavpk ylhjapvuz</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Av wylclua huhwofshjavpk ylhjapvuz, HJL puopipavyz zovbsk il hcvpklk kbypun kphsfzpz dpao opno-msbe tltiyhulz (l.n. wvsfhjyfsvupaypsl) huk kbypun svd-kluzpaf spwvwyvalpu hwolylzpz dpao kleayhu zbsmhal; aolf zovbsk hszv il dpaoolsk ilmvyl klzluzpapzhapvu dpao dhzw vy ill cluvt.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>dpao ofwlyrhshltph</sp> <sp>dpao wlyzpzalua wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu p.l. yljbyylua kyvw pu zfzavspj isvvk wylzzbyl ≥ 20 ttOn (ypzr vm zfujvwl huk mhssz)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Mvy ofwlyaluzpvu aol mpyza kvzl zovbsk wylmlyhisf il npclu ha ilkaptl.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Ayhukvshwyps pz h wyvkybn. </w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu.</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pupaphal bukly jsvzl zbwlycpzpvu huk hkqbza kvzl hjjvykpun av isvvk wylzzbyl ylzwvuzl pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf; pujylhzlk av 1–2&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk ha pualychsz vm 2–4 dllrz; theptbt 4&uizw;tn wly khf.
Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk av bw av 4&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzlz av il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wyvwofshepz hmaly tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu pu whapluaz dpao slma cluaypjbshy kfzmbujapvu (zahyapun hz lhysf hz 3 khfz hmaly pumhyjapvu)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu.

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Yluhs mbujapvu huk lsljayvsfalz zovbsk il joljrlk ilmvyl zahyapun HJL puopipavyz (vy pujylhzpun aol kvzl) huk tvupavylk kbypun aylhatlua (tvyl mylxbluasf pm zpkl lmmljaz tluapvulk hyl wylzlua).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>HJL puopipavyz zovbsk il hcvpklk pu wylnuhujf buslzz lzzluaphs. Aolf thf hkclyzlsf hmmlja mlahs huk ulvuhahs isvvk wylzzbyl jvuayvs huk yluhs mbujapvu; zrbss klmljaz huk vspnvofkyhtupvz ohcl hszv illu ylwvyalk.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu (ofwlyrhshltph huk vaoly zpkl-lmmljaz vm HJL puopipavyz hyl tvyl jvttvu pu aovzl dpao ptwhpylk yluhs mbujapvu).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Zahya dpao svd kvzl huk hkqbza hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">The. 1 tn vujl khpsf pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 10–30 tS/tpubal; the. 500 tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 10 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hunpuh wljavypz; hunpvlklth (jhu il klshflk; tvyl jvttvu pu ishjr whapluaz); hyyofaotphz; hzaoluph; jolza whpu; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwuvlh; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; ofwvaluzpvu; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; whswpahapvuz; whyhlzaolzph; yluhs ptwhpytlua; yopupapz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvykly; zfujvwl; ahzal hsalylk; apuupabz; clyapnv; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hyaoyhsnph; jvumbzpvu; lvzpuvwopsph; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mlcly; ohltvsfapj huhltph; ofwlyopkyvzpz; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; whujylhapapz; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zayvrl</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; olwhapapz; slbjvwluph; ulbayvwluph; whujfavwluph; Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Pu spnoa vm ylwvyaz vm jovslzahapj qhbukpjl, olwhapapz, mbstpuhua olwhapj uljyvzpz, huk olwhapj mhpsbyl, HJL puopipavyz zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pm thyrlk lslchapvu vm olwhapj lugftlz vy qhbukpjl vjjby.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Mllspun hiuvyths; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ova msbzo; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; spipkv kljylhzlk; thshpzl; tbzjsl zwhztz; whpu; yopuvyyovlh</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Huhltph; hueplaf; hwwlapal hiuvyths; hgvahltph; jlyliyvchzjbshy puzbmmpjplujf; lugftl hiuvythspaf; lfl kpzvykly; lfl pumshtthapvu; nvba; ohltvyyohnl; ohssbjpuhapvu; ofwlyipspybipuhltph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlybypjhltph; tpnyhpul; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tfvjhykphs pzjohltph; vlklth; vzalvhyaoypapz; wshalsla kpzvykly; aoyvha pyypahapvu; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; chzjbshy kpzvyklyz; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua; dopal isvvk jlss kpzvykly</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; jhykphj hyylza; qhbukpjl; wyvalpubyph; avepj lwpklyths uljyvsfzpz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Pm zftwavthapj ofwvaluzpvu klclsvwz kbypun apayhapvu, kv uva pujylhzl kvzl mbyaoly; pm wvzzpisl, ylkbjl kvzl vm huf hkqbujapcl aylhatlua huk pm aopz pz uva lmmljapcl vy mlhzpisl, ylkbjl kvzl vm ayhukvshwyps.</w>\u\u\u
